member.name: T:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1
member.summary: This class provides access to CSV files (charcater separated values) and parses the data into the application-side type T.
member.typeparam: The type T is used application-side and can be read from the data source or be written to the data sink.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1.CanCreate
member.summary: The default behavior for file storage, if it is allowed to create files or not.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1.CanDelete
member.summary: The default behavior for file storage, if it is allowed to delete files or not.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1.#ctor(TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup,TeleScope.Persistence.Abstractions.IParsable{`0},TeleScope.Persistence.Abstractions.IParsable{System.String[]})
member.summary: The constructor takes the setup of type as input parameter, parsers of type for incoming and outgoing data and binds the logging mechanism.
member.param: The setup is needed to work with a specific CSV file.
The incoming parser matches one CSV line with a data object of type T.
The outgoing parser matches one data object of type T to a CSV line.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1.Read
member.summary: Reads a given CSV file as data source and provides a collection of type T. If there is only one data object a collection with the length one is returned.
member.returns: The resulting data objects of type T.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1.Write(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Writes a collection of type T to a CSV file as data sink. If there is only one data object there is the need to provide a collection with one element.
member.param: The application-side data collection of type T.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorage`1.Update(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Updates the reference to the FileInfo object so that the data sink can be updated.

member.name: T:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup
member.summary: This storage setup extends to specify parameters for an access to CSV files.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup.Separator
member.summary: Gets the character to identify the separation between values.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup.StartRow
member.summary: Gets the index of the first row where the CSV data starts.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup.Header
member.summary: Gets a string that is used as heading line(s) before CSV data starts.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup.HasHeader
member.summary: Gets the information if the CSV storage has header information or not.

member.name: P:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup.Encoder
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding of the file.

member.name: M:TeleScope.Persistence.Csv.CsvStorageSetup.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Char,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: The default constructor calls the constructor of the base class and defines `UTF8` as default property.
member.param: The information about the file that will get accessed by a file storage.
Sets the information, if the setup provides the ability to create files.
Sets the information, if the setup provides the ability to delete files.
Sets the character to identify the separation between values.
Sets the index of the first row where the CSV data starts.
Sets a string that is used as heading line(s) before CSV data starts.
